text: Shikashi (kaihō suru dorei o) motanai-sha wa, ryōnin ga katamini fureru mae ni, 2kagetsu tsudzukete saikai shi nasai. Sore o nashi enai mono wa, 60-ri no hinja ni shoku o atae nasai. Kore wa, anata gata ni arrā to shito o shinji saseru tamedearu. Korera ga arrā no okitedearu. Fushin-sha ni taishite wa itamashī chōbatsu ga arou
